PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Included are all passive tree steps, gem setups and all rare and unique gear choices.
How to use: - Choose a passive tree in the bottom-left dropdown menu, and adjust your level. - Put on and edit example gear or import your own stuff with the Import/Export Build feature. - Adjust gem levels and quality, and enable optional gems if used. - Configure anything relevant in the Configuration tab.
Small notes: - All rare gear uses the most recommended affixes for that slot with average rolls. - Mastercrafts are placeholders and signify that it makes sense to add any of them if not present already. - Lightning Resistance and Dexterity are symbolic for each resistance or attribute that you may need. - The Elreon mana mod on jewelry is not an error, it's just not worth spending 4 chaos for +5 more mana. - Enchantments and corruptions aren't included, add the ones you plan to use manually. - Activate Flasks to see their impact on DPS or defense. - Gems that don't need quality or need to stay at a certain level are shown like that, all others are defaulted at 20/20.
